original: 東漢末年，南華老仙授張角「太平要術」。張角自稱大賢良師，創太平道，高呼「蒼天已死，黃天當立，歲在甲子，天下大吉」。
text: At the end of the Eastern Han Dynasty, Nanhua Lao Xian gave Zhang Jiao the "Tai Ping Essential Technique". Zhang Jiao, who claims to be a great wise and mentor, created a peaceful path, chanting, "The sky is dead, the yellow sky is standing, and the age is in Jiazi.
